verses.verse: <S%G1063>For<s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G1919>the<s%> <S%G1919>earthly<s%> <S%G3614>house<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> our <S%G4636>tent<s%> is <S%G2647>dissolved,<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G3619>building<s%> from <S%G2316>God,<s%> a <S%G3614>house<s%> not made with <S%G886>hands,<s%> <S%G166>eternal,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3772>heavens.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> most <S%G2532>certainly<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> we <S%G4727>groan,<s%> <S%G1971>longing<s%> to be <S%G1902>clothed<s%> with <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3613>habitation<s%> which is <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven;<s%>
<S%G1489>if<s%> so be <S%G2532>that<s%> being <S%G1746>clothed<s%> we <S%G2147>will<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> be <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G1131>naked.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2532>indeed<s%> we who <S%G5607>are<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> this <S%G4636>tent<s%> do <S%G4727>groan,<s%> being <S%G916>burdened;<s%> <S%G2309>not<s%> <S%G3756>that<s%> we <S%G1562>desire<s%> to be <S%G235>unclothed,<s%> <S%G1902>but<s%> <S%G2666>that<s%> we desire to be <S%G2443>clothed,<s%> <S%G2666>that<s%> what is <S%G5259>mortal<s%> may be swallowed <S%G2222>up<s%> by <S%G2222>life.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> he <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2716>made<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> this <S%G846>very<s%> <S%G5124>thing<s%> is <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> to <S%G2254>us<s%> the down <S%G728>payment<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore,<s%> we are <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G2292>confident<s%> and <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2532>while<s%> we are at <S%G1736>home<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4983>body,<s%> we are <S%G1553>absent<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord;<s%>

We are <S%G2292>courageous,<s%> I <S%G2532>say,<s%> and are <S%G2106>willing<s%> <S%G3123>rather<s%> to be <S%G1553>absent<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G4983>body,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to be at <S%G1736>home<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> also we make it our <S%G5389>aim,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1535>whether<s%> at <S%G1736>home<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G1553>absent,<s%> to <S%G1511>be<s%> well <S%G2101>pleasing<s%> to <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2248>we<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> be <S%G5319>revealed<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> the judgment <S%G968>seat<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ;<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> each <S%G1538>one<s%> may <S%G2865>receive<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> <S%G1223>in<s%> the <S%G4983>body,<s%> <S%G4314>according<s%> to <S%G3739>what<s%> he has <S%G4238>done,<s%> <S%G1535>whether<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G2556>bad.<s%>

<S%G1492>Knowing<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> the <S%G5401>fear<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> we <S%G3982>persuade<s%> <S%G444>men,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> we are <S%G5319>revealed<s%> to <S%G2316>God;<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> I <S%G1679>hope<s%> that we are <S%G5319>revealed<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4893>consciences.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> we are <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4921>commending<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> speak as <S%G1325>giving<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G874>occasion<s%> of <S%G2745>boasting<s%> on <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G5228>behalf,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> you may <S%G2192>have<s%> something <S%G4314>to<s%> answer <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2744>boast<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4383>appearance,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> in <S%G2588>heart.<s%>
<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1535>if<s%> we are beside <S%G1839>ourselves,<s%> it is for <S%G2316>God.<s%> Or <S%G1535>if<s%> we are of <S%G4993>sober<s%> <S%G5213>mind,<s%> it is for you.

<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G4912>constrains<s%> <S%G2248>us;<s%> <S%G5124>because<s%> we <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G3754>thus,<s%> that <S%G1487><s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G686>therefore<s%> <S%G599><s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G599>died.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He <S%G599>died<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G2198>should<s%> no <S%G3371>longer<s%> <S%G2198>live<s%> to <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> to <S%G3588>him<s%> who <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> sakes <S%G599>died<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> rose <S%G1453>again.<s%>

<S%G5620>Therefore<s%> <S%G575><s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> no <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> from now <S%G3568>on.<s%> <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2532>Even<s%> <S%G1487>though<s%> we have <S%G1097>known<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G235>yet<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G1097>we<s%> know him so no <S%G3765>more.<s%>

<S%G5620>Therefore<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> he is a <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G2937>creation.<s%> The old <S%G744>things<s%> have passed <S%G3928>away.<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> have <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G2537>new.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> are <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2644>reconciled<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> to <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> to <S%G2254>us<s%> the <S%G1248>ministry<s%> of <S%G2643>reconciliation;<s%>

<S%G5613>namely,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2644>reconciling<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> to <S%G1438>himself,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G3049>reckoning<s%> to <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3900>trespasses,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> having <S%G5087>committed<s%> <S%G1722>to<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2643>reconciliation.<s%>

We are <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G4243>ambassadors<s%> on <S%G5228>behalf<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> as <S%G5613>though<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> were <S%G3870>entreating<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G2257>us:<s%> we <S%G1189>beg<s%> you <S%G5228>on<s%> <S%G5547>behalf<s%> of <S%G2644>Christ,<s%> be reconciled to <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G4160>him<s%> who <S%G1097>knew<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> he made to be <S%G266>sin<s%> on <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G5228>behalf;<s%> so <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> might <S%G1096>become<s%> the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
